name: Vincent Horwitz Company, Inc., Appellant, v. Cooper et al.

judges: Before Maxisy, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
parties: Vincent Horwitz Company, Inc., Appellant, v. Cooper et al.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The decree of the court below is affirmed on the opinion of President Judge Patterson, appellant to pay the costs.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Robert G. Haberstroh, with him Martin Goodman and Harold Broion, for appellant.
Samuel H. Jubelirer, with him Jubelirer, Jubelirer é Smith, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Vincent Horwitz Company, Inc., Appellant, v. Cooper et al.
Argued March 19,1945.
Before Maxisy, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
Robert G. Haberstroh, with him Martin Goodman and Harold Broion, for appellant.
Samuel H. Jubelirer, with him Jubelirer, Jubelirer é Smith, for appellees.
April 9, 1945:
